verses.verse: Now<WG2532> on the first<WG3391> day of the week,<WG4521> very early<WG3722> in the morning, they came<WG2064> to the sepulcher,<WG3418> bringing<WG5342> the spices<WG759> which<WG3739> they had prepared,<WG2090> and certain others with them.
And they found<WG2147> the stone<WG3037> rolled<WG617> away<WG617> from the sepulcher.<WG3419>
And they entered<WG1525> in, and found<WG2147> not the body<WG4983> of the Lord<WG2962> Jesus.<WG2424>
And it came<WG1096> to pass, as they were much<WG1280> perplexed<WG1280> thereabout,<WG4012> <WG5127> behold,<WG2400> two<WG1417> men<WG435> stood<WG2186> by them in shining<WG797> garments:<WG2067>

And as they were afraid,<WG1719> and bowed<WG2827> down their faces<WG4383> to the earth,<WG1093> they said<WG2036> to them, Why<WG5101> seek<WG2212> you the living<WG2198> among<WG3326> the dead?<WG3498>
He is not here,<WG5602> but is risen:<WG1453> remember<WG3415> how<WG5613> he spoke<WG2980> to you when he was yet<WG2089> in Galilee,<WG1056>

Saying,<WG3004> The Son<WG5207> of man<WG444> must<WG1163> be delivered<WG3860> into<WG1519> the hands<WG5495> of sinful<WG268> men,<WG444> and be crucified,<WG4717> and the third<WG5154> day<WG2250> rise<WG450> again.<WG450>
And they remembered<WG3415> his words,<WG4487>
And returned<WG5290> from the sepulcher,<WG3419> and told<WG518> all<WG3956> these<WG5023> things to the eleven,<WG1733> and to all<WG3956> the rest.<WG3062>

It was Mary<WG3137> Magdalene <WG3094>and Joanna,<WG2489> and Mary<WG3137> the mother of James,<WG2385> and other<WG3062> women that were with them, which<WG3739> told<WG3004> these<WG5023> things to the apostles.<WG652>
And their words<WG4487> seemed<WG5316> to them as idle<WG3026> tales,<WG3026> and they believed<WG569> them not.

Then<WG1161> arose<WG450> Peter,<WG4074> and ran<WG5143> to the sepulcher;<WG3419> and stooping<WG3879> down,<WG3879> he beheld<WG991> the linen<WG3608> clothes<WG3608> laid<WG2749> by themselves,<WG3441> and departed,<WG565> wondering<WG2296> in himself<WG1438> at that which was come<WG1096> to pass.

And, behold,<WG2400> two<WG1417> of them went<WG4198> that same<WG846> day<WG2250> to a village<WG2968> called<WG3686> Emmaus,<WG1695> which was from Jerusalem<WG2419> about three score<WG1835> furlongs.<WG4712>
And they talked<WG3656> together<WG4314> <WG240> of all<WG3956> these<WG5130> things which had happened.<WG4819>
And it came<WG1096> to pass, that, while<WG1722> <WG3588> they communed<WG3656> together and reasoned,<WG4802> Jesus<WG2424> himself<WG846> drew near,<WG1448> and went<WG4848> with them.
But their eyes<WG3788> were held<WG2902> that they should not know<WG1921> him.
And he said<WG2036> to them, What<WG5101> manner of communications <WG3056> are these<WG3778> that you have<WG474> one<WG240> to another,<WG240> as you walk,<WG4043> and are sad? <WG4659>

And the one<WG1520> of them, whose<WG3739> name<WG3686> was Cleopas,<WG2810> answering<WG611> said<WG2036> to him, Are you only<WG3441> a stranger<WG3939> in Jerusalem,<WG2419> and have not known<WG1097> the things which are come<WG1096> to pass there<WG1722> <WG846> in these<WG5025> days?<WG2250>

And he said<WG2036> to them, What<WG4169> things? And they said<WG2036> to him, Concerning<WG4012> Jesus<WG2424> of Nazareth,<WG3478> which<WG3739> was a prophet<WG4396> mighty<WG1415> in deed<WG2041> and word<WG3056> before<WG1726> God<WG2316> and all<WG3956> the people:<WG2992>
And how<WG3704> the chief<WG749> priests<WG749> and our rulers<WG758> delivered<WG3860> him to be condemned<WG1519> <WG2917> to death,<WG2288> and have<WG474> crucified<WG4717> him.

But we trusted<WG1679> that it had been<WG2076> he which should<WG3195> have<WG474> redeemed<WG3084> Israel:<WG2474> and beside<WG4862> all<WG3956> this,<WG5125> to day<WG4594> is the third<WG5154> day<WG2250> since<WG575> these<WG5023> things were done.<WG1096>
Yes,<WG235> and certain<WG5100> women<WG1135> also<WG2532> of our company made<WG1839> us astonished,<WG1839> which were early<WG3721> at<WG1909> the sepulcher;<WG3419>

And when they found<WG2147> not his body,<WG4983> they came,<WG2064> saying,<WG3004> that they had also<WG2532> seen<WG3708> a vision<WG3701> of angels,<WG32> which<WG3739> said<WG3004> that he was alive.<WG2198>
And certain<WG5100> of them which were with us went<WG565> to the sepulcher,<WG3419> and found<WG2147> it even<WG3779> so<WG3779> as the women<WG1135> had said:<WG2036> but him they saw<WG1492> not.
Then<WG1161> he said<WG2036> to them, O fools,<WG453> and slow<WG1021> of heart<WG2588> to believe <WG4100> <WG1909> all<WG3956> that the prophets<WG4396> have spoken: <WG2980>
Ought<WG1163> not Christ<WG5547> to have suffered<WG3958> these<WG5023> things, and to enter<WG1525> into<WG1519> his glory? <WG1391>
And beginning<WG756> at<WG575> Moses<WG3475> and all<WG3956> the prophets,<WG4396> he expounded<WG1329> to them in all<WG3956> the scriptures<WG1124> the things concerning<WG4012> himself.<WG1438>
And they drew near<WG1448> to the village,<WG2968> where<WG3757> they went:<WG4198> and he made<WG4364> as though he would have gone<WG4198> further.<WG4206>

But they constrained<WG3849> him, saying,<WG3004> Abide<WG3306> with us: for it is toward<WG4314> evening,<WG2073> and the day<WG2250> is far spent.<WG2827> And he went<WG1525> in to tarry<WG3306> with them.
And it came<WG1096> to pass, as he sat<WG2625> at<WG2625> meat with them, he took<WG2983> bread,<WG740> and blessed<WG2127> it, and broke,<WG2806> and gave<WG1929> to them.
And their eyes<WG3788> were opened,<WG1272> and they knew<WG1921> him; and he vanished<WG1096> <WG855> out of their sight.

And they said<WG2036> one<WG240> to another,<WG240> Did not our heart<WG2588> burn<WG2545> within<WG1722> us, while<WG5613> he talked<WG2980> with us by the way,<WG3598> and while<WG5613> he opened<WG1272> to us the scriptures?<WG1124>
And they rose<WG450> up the same<WG846> hour,<WG5610> and returned<WG5290> to Jerusalem,<WG2419> and found<WG2147> the eleven<WG1733> gathered<WG4867> together,<WG4867> and them that were with them,
Saying,<WG3004> The Lord<WG2962> is risen<WG1453> indeed,<WG3689> and has appeared<WG3700> to Simon.<WG4613>
And they told<WG1834> what<WG3588> things were done in the way,<WG3598> and how<WG5613> he was known<WG1097> of them in breaking<WG2800> of bread.<WG740>
And as they thus<WG3778> spoke,<WG2980> Jesus<WG2424> himself<WG846> stood<WG2476> in the middle<WG3319> of them, and said<WG3004> to them, Peace <WG1515> be to you.
But they were terrified<WG4422> and affrighted,<WG1719> and supposed<WG1380> that they had seen<WG2334> a spirit.<WG4151>
And he said<WG2036> to them, Why<WG5101> are you troubled?<WG5015> and why<WG1302> do thoughts<WG1261> arise<WG305> in your<WG5216> hearts? <WG2588>

Behold<WG1492> my hands<WG5495> and my feet,<WG4228> that it is I myself: handle<WG5584> me, and see;<WG1492> for a spirit<WG4151> has<WG2192> not flesh<WG4561> and bones,<WG3747> as you see<WG2334> me have. <WG2192>
And when he had thus<WG5124> spoken,<WG2036> he showed<WG1925> them his hands<WG5495> and his feet.<WG4228>
And while they yet<WG2089> believed<WG569> not for joy,<WG5479> and wondered,<WG2296> he said<WG2036> to them, Have<WG2192> you here<WG1759> any<WG5100> meat? <WG1034>
And they gave<WG1929> him a piece<WG3313> of a broiled<WG3702> fish,<WG2486> and of an honeycomb.<WG3193> <WG2781>
And he took<WG2983> it, and did eat<WG5315> before<WG1799> them.

And he said<WG2036> to them, These <WG3778> are the words<WG3056> which<WG3739> I spoke<WG2980> to you, while I was yet<WG2089> with you, that all<WG3956> things must<WG1163> be fulfilled,<WG4137> which<WG3588> were written<WG1125> in the law<WG3551> of Moses,<WG3475> and in the prophets,<WG4396> and in the psalms,<WG5568> concerning<WG4012> me.
Then<WG5119> opened<WG1272> he their understanding,<WG3563> that they might understand<WG4920> the scriptures,<WG1124>

And said<WG2036> to them, Thus<WG3779> it is written,<WG1125> and thus<WG3779> it behooved<WG1163> Christ<WG5547> to suffer,<WG3958> and to rise<WG450> from the dead<WG3498> the third<WG5154> day: <WG2250>

And that repentance<WG3341> and remission<WG859> of sins<WG266> should be preached<WG2784> in his name<WG3686> among<WG1519> all<WG3956> nations,<WG1484> beginning<WG756> at<WG575> Jerusalem. <WG2419>
And you are witnesses<WG3144> of these<WG5130> things.

And, behold,<WG2400> I send<WG649> the promise<WG1860> of my Father<WG3962> on you: but tarry<WG2523> you in the city<WG4172> of Jerusalem,<WG2419> until<WG2193> you be endued<WG1746> with power<WG1411> from on high. <WG5311>
And he led<WG1806> them out as far<WG2193> as to Bethany,<WG963> and he lifted<WG1869> up his hands,<WG5495> and blessed<WG2127> them.
And it came<WG1096> to pass, while<WG1722> <WG3588> he blessed<WG2127> them, he was parted<WG1339> from them, and carried<WG399> up into<WG1519> heaven.<WG3772>
And they worshipped<WG4352> him, and returned<WG5290> to Jerusalem<WG2419> with great<WG3173> joy:<WG5479>
And were continually<WG1725> in the temple,<WG2411> praising<WG134> and blessing<WG2127> God.<WG2316> Amen.<WG281>
